metadata.title: CVE-2015-5734 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the legacy theme previewimplementation in wp-includes/theme.php in WordPress before 4.2.4 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a craftedstring.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
